hero.title: Explore the future of Procrastination
hero.text: Let‘s explore and create your own procrastiantion style.

info.title: What is Procratinator
info.text: What is robot? Robot is a special machine to make your life easier, more comfortable. A brand new robot for your procrastination is here!

features.title: Breathtaking features of Procrastinator
features.text: A lot of funny stuff for your joy. Do you need guilty pleasure? Here are lot of them!

card.$0-text: Recharge your battery and relax your brain with a collection of fun ideas
card.$1-text: Comfortable variant for any amount of time
card.$2-text: Works perfect on any devices staring with a tiny smartphone to huge gaming laptop
